    • Striking Comparison: Can Kane replicate Shearer's success for England at Euro 2016?

      20 years ago Alan Shearer scored 31 goals in 35 games for Blackburn to head the Premier League scoring charts before heading to Euro 1996. Harry Kane looks set to become the first Englishman since Kevin Phillips in 2000 to become top ​EPL scorer this season. But how do Shearer and Kane compare? More »
